snippet.title: Minimal Move - Teaser - PC and consoles
snippet.description:
Tako studio is happy to introduce to the world their very first game!

Minimal move is a 3d cooperative puzzle game taking place in a wonder cubic world. Play two characters Ido and Kaiten and unveal the secret of this mysterious galaxy. In the original perspective of the world, engage your brain, and feel the new sence of 3D puzzle game, 

That is Minimal Move.

https://www.minimal-move.com/

Follow all the news about Minimal Move on social media !

Twitter : https://twitter.com/MinimalMoveGame
Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/teamtakostudio/
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/MinimalMoveGame/
